title: JSON schema for additional attribute definition files.

attributeDefinition.description: Defines an Active Directory Schema attribute used to verify and define functionality in the API operations.

Class.description: The GUID of the Schema Class the attribute is for.

Name.description: The name of the schema attribute.

IsInGlobalCatalog.description: Indicates whether the attribute is retrievable when querying the Global Catalog.

IsSingleValued.description: Indicates whether the attribute is single-valued.

RangeLower.description: The inclusive lower bound the length or integer value must be for an attribute's value.

RangeUpper.description: The inclusive upper bound the length or integer value must be for an attribute's value.
